name: @overleaf/o-error
description: Light-weight helpers for handling JavaScript Errors in node.js and the browser. Helps with long stack traces, Error subclasses, wrapping internal errors (causes), and attaching extra data to errors for logging.

scripts.build: npm run --silent typecheck && npm run --silent test && npm run --silent declaration:build && npm run --silent update-readme
scripts.declaration:build: rm -f index.d.ts && tsc --allowJs --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --moduleResolution node --target ES6 index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run --silent declaration:build && npm run --silent declaration:check
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit

author: Overleaf (https://www.overleaf.com)
